titles.title: Authorizing the Speaker to appoint a committee to notify the President of the assembly of the Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/6/1999--Introduced. Provides for appointment of a House committee joined with a Senate committee to notify the President that a quorum of each House has assembled.
